weekly_top_story.headline: HHS announces efforts to improve long COVID care
weekly_top_story.summary: The Department of Health and Human Services launched new initiatives including a public awareness campaign, an online platform for clinical collaboration, and released a report on health coverage to enhance care for individuals with long COVID, addressing a critical ongoing health challenge.

stories.headline: FDA issues global recall of Olympus ViziShot 2 FLEX needles manufactured before May 12
stories.summary: The FDA announced a global recall of Olympus ViziShot 2 FLEX needles due to safety concerns, directly impacting clinical practice and patient safety in procedures requiring these needles.

stories.headline: ACIP recommends consulting healthcare providers for COVID-19 vaccine updates
stories.summary: The Advisory Committee on Immunization Practices urged patients to consult healthcare providers regarding COVID-19 vaccination, reflecting ongoing updates in vaccine guidance essential for patient care.

stories.headline: FDA recalls Mo-Vis BVBA R-net Joysticks due to critical firmware error
stories.summary: The FDA identified a Class I recall for Mo-Vis BVBA R-net joysticks used in wheelchairs because of a firmware error that compromises device functionality and patient safety.
